count-retrieved: {{count}} message(s) retrieved from the source queue.
no-messages: There are no messages in the inspection queue.  Click the envelope button next to the 'Source queue uri' to fetch the specified 'count' number of messages from the queue.

exceptions.source-queue-uri: Enter or select the 'Source queue uri' to retrieve messages from.
exceptions.destination-queue-uri: Enter or select the 'Destination queue uri' to move/copy the messages to.
